title: MG Windsor EV gets 15,176 bookings order withing 24 hours of launch
description: MG Motors received 15,176 bookings for its new Windsor EV within 24 hours of its launch. The Windsor EV blends the comfort of a sedan and the expanse of an SUV. It comes in three variants and four colour options. It offers various driving modes and a range of 332 km on a single charge.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
